message: Rule applicable: mod_to_bubble ([("Bubble", 6000)]), to expression: a % b, resulting in: {SafeMod(a,b) @ (b != 0)}
Rule applicable: bubble_up ([("Bubble", 8900)]), to expression: ({SafeMod(a,b) @ (b != 0)} = 1), resulting in: {(SafeMod(a,b) = 1) @ And([(b != 0)])}
Rule applicable: expand_bubble ([("Bubble", 8900)]), to expression: {(SafeMod(a,b) = 1) @ And([(b != 0)])}, resulting in: And([(SafeMod(a,b) = 1), And([(b != 0)])])
Rule applicable: introduce_modeq ([("Minion", 4200)]), to expression: (SafeMod(a,b) = 1), resulting in: ModEq(a, b, 1)
Rule applicable: remove_unit_vector_and ([("Base", 8800)]), to expression: And([(b != 0)]), resulting in: (b != 0)
